channel.title: Setlevel when pressing button
channel.description:
Hi.
I'm a noob at programming java, but I'm still learning... Basicly, what I want is that when you press the button 200, the interface where you type numbers in pops up and when you type a number, it gets set as that level.
IM USING DEMENTHIUM 639 SOURCE.
I only need a code, I know where to put it and stuff.
Thank you :D I'll rep

item.title: Setlevel when pressing button
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Well, how do you change so you can only do setlevel with combat stats?

Read full topic

item.title: Setlevel when pressing button
item.dc:creator: @killadragz14 killadragz14
item.description:
@killadragz14 wrote:

You might have to add a interface for that which you would have to code both the client and server.
Setlvl or master command should be good enough.

Read full topic
